ygData.subject: Re: Interesting Duel
ygData.msgSnippet: If your cleric guildmate was wearing magic resist item and she RM herself so that her magic resist is over 100.  The result would be very different.  You will
ygData.messageBody:
If your cleric guildmate was wearing magic resist item and she RM herself so
that her magic resist is over 100. The result would be very different. You
will never be able to fear or even chain her. The key to beat a bard in PvP
is magic resist. :)


> >
> > Last night while I was testing out the CoD and DDD with my guildmate we
> > were in duel mode. While testing, my guildmates would make fun of a bard
>vs
> > a cleric how she would wup my ass. She is a lvl 39 clerics that can
>solo a
> > Raider in HK just fine. While me being a lvl 35 bard cannot even solo a
> > hard blue guard, haha. So anyway after my testing (which I posted on
> > another post), I told her why not duel and find out.
> >
